name: civitai-data-manager
description: Civitai Data Manager is a self-hosted tool for downloading and managing Stable Diffusion models from Civitai. It helps users organize, categorize, and efficiently update their local model collection.
features: Model Management: Download and organize Stable Diffusion models. Complete library.
Civitai Integration: Direct integration with Civitai platform. Easy downloads.
Categorization: Organize models by type and category. Smart organization.
Update Tracking: Monitor and update model versions. Stay current.
Local Collection: Manage your local model library. Efficient storage.
Self-Hosted: Keep your AI model collection private. Data control.
